instructions: Go to Settings > Do Not Disturb. Scroll down, then tap Activate. Choose when you want Do Not Disturb While Driving to turn on. Automatically: When iPhone detects you might be driving. When Connected to Car Bluetooth: When your iPhone is connected to a car s Bluetooth system. Manually: When you turn it on in Control Center .
Tap the Do Not Disturb notification on the Lock screen. Tap I m Not Driving.
Go to Settings , then tap Do Not Disturb > Auto-Reply. Tap the message to bring up the keyboard, then type a new message.
